title: Here's a list of 20 articles up to 2020 that review various aspects of Natural Language Processing (NLP) research. These articles cover a range of topics including foundational concepts, recent advancements, and specific subfields within NLP

**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Named Entity Recognition from Deep Learning models"**
